title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Designing with Agents: A Playbook for Enterprise Engineering Leaders (DVT102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能体设计：企业工程领导者实战手册 (DVT102)
abstract: Enterprises are asking not “if” but “how” to integrate agents into their software delivery pipelines. Drawing from Cognition’s work with Fortune 500 engineering teams, Russell Kaplan, President of Cognition, will share a practical playbook for senior technical leaders: when to delegate to autonomous agents like Devin, how to govern human-in-the-loop workflows in IDEs like Windsurf, and how to measure ROI beyond productivity metrics. This session balances inspiration with actionable guidance, equipping attendees with strategies to future-proof their engineering organizations while avoiding common pitfalls. This presentation is brought to you by Cognition, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 企业现在问的不是"是否"而是"如何"将智能体集成到他们的软件交付管道中。基于Cognition与财富500强工程团队的合作经验，Cognition总裁Russell Kaplan将为高级技术领导者分享一个实用手册：何时委托给像Devin这样的自主智能体，如何在Windsurf等IDE中管理人机协作工作流，以及如何衡量超越生产力指标的投资回报率。本次会议平衡了启发性与可操作的指导，为与会者提供策略来为其工程组织做好未来准备，同时避免常见陷阱。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Cognition提供支持。
